Hello!

We are LoveVPS we provide loveable VPS solutions for people like you.

We use the following locations: - Custodian DC (Kent ,UK) - DimeNoc / HostDime (Orlando, Florida) - One Willshire (Los Angeles, CA)

All of our UK & LA & Florida services include: - RAID 10 Storage - Intel E3-1230 or above CPU - Free Instant Setup with love! - Supermicro Servers - 24x7 Support - SolusVM - rDNS Capability

////////////////////////////////////////////

- 600MB Ram

- KVM/SolusVM

ONLY **$6.99/Month **
